main.name: Efwan Rizaldi
main.description: I am a Frontend developer || React Entusiast
main.bio: I have a solid understanding of web development, with a strong focus on frontend technologies. I also possess skills in finance, particularly in accounting, and am proficient in both spoken and written English. I am a hardworking and adaptable individual who thrives both independently and in team settings. Currently, I am passionate about growing my expertise in web development as both a career and a personal interest.

address.street: Jl Abdul Gani, Rt 03 / Rw 01, Karanggan, Gunung Putri

resume.skillmessage: I possess skills in finance, particularly in accounting, and am proficient in both spoken and written English. I am a hardworking individual, capable of working independently or collaboratively within a team. Currently, I am enthusiastic about developing my passion for web development, especially using React.js.

education.description: Learned practical and theoretical skills in automotive repair and maintenance.
Completed structured training on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js fundamentals. Final project included building a responsive portfolio site.

work.title: Inventory Accountant
work.description: Recorded incoming and outgoing goods; performed inventory valuation; conducted stock opname and reconciliation; created inventory reports; and coordinated with multiple departments.

work.title: Owner
work.description: Managed daily operations; provided top-up services; sold mobile accessories, vouchers, and digital products; performed basic phone repairs and maintenance; handled customer service, sales, and inventory.
